attributes.action: make southern rail trains free to all members of public until delays are sorted
attributes.background: All trains at peak times are either delayed or cancelled and have been for a number of months. I do not see why we are paying for a delayed service! until the trains start running on time and the crew shortage is over all travel on them should be free for all.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The price of train tickets is the responsibility of train operating companies.
